infobox.Japanese title:: 標的は毛利小五郎  (Tāgetto wa Mōri Kogorō)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure  Miwako Sato  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Isshin Chiba as Hiroshi Ukita  Yasuhiko Kawazu as Inoue  Hironori Miyata as Ogawa

sections.Situation: Kogoro is targeted by a killer who is after Kimura. Kogoro accidentally took his jacket at a bar and now the killer is trying to kill him.
sections.People:
- Bar Lemon owner
- Photographer
- Robber
- Victim (car crash - injured)
- Cleaning Ogawa owner
- Photographer
- Mysterious man targeted by a killer
- Bar Lemon regular customer
- Bar Lemon regular customer
- Bar Lemon regular customer
sections.Remastered version: A remastered version of this case was aired on February 14, 2015.
sections.Trivia:
- The scooter is an Honda Super Cub.
- The stolen truck is a 2001 Hino Ranger and has a license plate of 32-14.
- Inoue's car is a 1997 Blue Velvet Pearl Toyota Caldina GT−T Active Sports [T210G], the license plate of 53-29.
- Takagi and Megure's car has a license plate of 7-25.
- Kitada appears in Love Letter to Ran.
